name: weasyl_enhancer
title: Weasyl Enhancer
description: Small tweaks to the Weasyl browsing experience
author: Taeler Dixon

preferences.name: shrinkLarge
preferences.title: Shrink Large Submissions
preferences.description: Fit large images to my browser window on page load

preferences.name: prevDesc
preferences.title: Preview Description
preferences.description: Show the submission's description in the preview

preferences.name: prevTags
preferences.title: Preview Tags
preferences.description: Show the submission's tags in the preview

preferences.name: prevUser
preferences.title: Preview User
preferences.description: Show the submitter's avatar and username in the preview

preferences.name: prevImage
preferences.title: Preview Image
preferences.description: Show a teaser of the full image in the preview

preferences.name: prevDelay
preferences.title: Preview Delay
preferences.description: How long (in milliseconds) to wait before creating a preview

preferences.name: showQueryBuilder
preferences.title: Show Search Builder
preferences.description: Display a button for an advanced search form
